original: 董卓為獲取支持，大封官吏，張咨因此獲封南陽太守。 討董時，張咨未明確表態，孫堅又曾與其有隙，便趁機設計宴請張咨，在席上命長沙主簿問責張咨，之後將其處斬。
text: In order to gain support, Dong Zhuo sealed the officials, and Zhang Zi was named the prefect of Nanyang. When discussing with Dong, Zhang Zi did not make a clear statement. Sun Jian once again had a gap with him, so he took the opportunity to design a banquet for Zhang Zi, and ordered the director of Changsha to hold him accountable, and then cut him off.
